option.name: content
option.value: Avoid overly verbose descriptions or unnecessary details. Start with a short sentence in imperative form, no more than 50 characters long. Before message add a conventional commit prefix. Then leave an empty line and continue with a more detailed explanation. Write only one sentence for the first part, and two or three sentences at most for the detailed explanation. Write each feature or fix description on the next line and begin with an asterisk to appear in markdown mode as a dotted list.

task.summary:
Add IDE, Docker, and config files
Included new .idea configuration files for various settings such as web resources, Symfony, and PHPSpec. Added comprehensive .dockerignore and a new Dockerfile.Expanded workspace settings and watcher tasks to support SCSS and other configurations.

chore: remove unused user and group configuration
Removed sudo and gosu from package list to streamline the Docker image. Eliminated unused arguments and environment variables related to user configuration. * Removed USER and GROUP arguments and environment variables. * Deleted user creation and permission-related commands. * Cleaned up .idea/workspace.xml configuration file.

MESSAGE.value:
Add IDE, Docker, and config files
Included new .idea configuration files for various settings such as web resources, Symfony, and PHPSpec. Added comprehensive .dockerignore and a new Dockerfile.Expanded workspace settings and watcher tasks to support SCSS and other configurations.

Remove user-specific configurations from Dockerfile
Eliminated sudo and gosu packages and removed user and group settings to simplify the Dockerfile. This reduces unnecessary complexity and potential security vulnerabilities associated with user permissions. Additionally, updated IDE project files with relevant configurations.

chore: remove unused user and group configuration
Removed sudo and gosu from package list to streamline the Docker image. Eliminated unused arguments and environment variables related to user configuration. * Removed USER and GROUP arguments and environment variables. * Deleted user creation and permission-related commands. * Cleaned up .idea/workspace.xml configuration file.
